ygData.subject: Re: manual attack
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, actually, I recieved a letter from a sk pkiller. I had heard that warr types were seriously hindered becuase they cannot keep the mage types on there
ygData.messageBody:
Well, actually, I recieved a letter from a sk pkiller. I had heard that warr
types were seriously hindered becuase they cannot keep the mage types on
there screen, so the mage just zigs and zags ans casts another firebolt as
soon as he loses you. This sk claimed that by not using auto attack, he
could only swing when the swing counts(when mage is on his screen) and that
he could effectively pkill mages this way. Well, I can find the auto attack
on off button, heh
Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 12:56 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] manual attack


> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> about the closest we can do is to turn autoattack on and turn it off again
> right away. i.e. run up to attack range, and hit = twice. not sure of the
> usefulness of this technique except in the case of a fleeing enemy tho.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>
>
